articles.author: Chuck Johnston, CNN
articles.title: A man was charged in the rape of a 10-year-old who traveled to Indiana for an abortion
articles.description: A Columbus man has been charged with raping a 10-year-old Ohio girl who then had to travel to Indiana seeking an abortion after the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade, according to court proceedings CNN obtained through affiliate WBNS.

articles.title: Chaos in Sri Lanka after protesters seize prime minister’s office

articles.title: Uvalde video raises more calls for police accountability
